title: aruL purindiDAdu
sahitya:
aruL purindiDAdu irundiDAdE murugA anudinamum unai paNindiDum enakku


anupallavi

  poruL tEDi salikkAdu pOrADi palikkAdu maruL kUDi mayangi en matiyODi viDAdu


caraNam    cintai nondu naliya vandiDum shOdanaigaL tandiDum vEdanaiyai tAngum tiranuravum
venda manam mElum vendiDiTTa pOdilum undanait-tudi sheidu uyyum urudi peravum
